channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 06:44 Driven the alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Stop after further reports.
item.description: 游릭 06:44 Driven the alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Stop after further reports.#Kirovograd This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 06:40 Driven the alarm to the Zhytomyr region.Creck on further reports.
item.description: 游릭 06:40 Driven the alarm to the Zhytomyr region.Creck on further reports.#Zhytomyr_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 06:38 Driven the alarm in Kyiv. Investigate by subsequent messages.
item.description: 游릭 06:38 Driven the alarm in Kyiv. Investigate by subsequent messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 06:33 Driven Alarm to Kamyansky District.Creck on further reports.
item.description: 游릭 06:33 Driven Alarm to Kamyansky District.Creck on further reports.#Kamyan_ region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 06:32 Alarm to Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District- Lypetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 06:32 Alarm to Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District- Lypetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 05:57 The threat of shelling! Now in the Belenkovsky territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
item.description: 游댮 05:57 The threat of shelling! Now in the Belenkovsky territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
